title.rendered: Jaybird X4 Wireless Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones with Microphone, For Sports, Running and Fitness, Customisable EQ…

content.rendered:
Colour Name:Storm Metallic | Pattern Name:Headphones

Product Description

The Jaybird X4 Bluetooth Wireless Earphones are prepared for the all-spherical runner and out of doors athlete – comfy, rugged and totally waterproof to deal with any run, experience or path in any situation. The patented sports activities ear fins hug across the prime, again and decrease floor areas of the ear, offering a safe and comfy suit you’ll barely discover. These Bluetooth earphones additionally come with a set of various sized in-ear buds and sports activities ear fins, so you may customise the match to go well with you and your wants, together with for below a helmet – for uninterrupted audio when you train. The thermo-reactive ideas guarantee enhanced sturdiness and premium sound – conforming to your ear canals. The rechargeable battery has as much as 8 hours after a single cost, so that you’ll by no means skip a beat. You can even customise the EQ by way of the Jaybird App, then save your most popular settings to your wi-fi headphones – supplying you with full management over your listening expertise. Not solely are you able to hearken to music with these headphones, however the built-in microphone means you may reply calls right away in case you’re listening by your smartphone. These Bluetooth headphones come with a 2-Year Manufacturer’s Guarantee – so you may have a fear-free expertise when you train.

Box Contains

– X4 sport wi-fi headphones – Comply Ultra ear ideas M/L – Oval silicone ear ideas S/L – Secure-fit ear fins 1/2/3 – Speed cinch – USB 2.0 charging cable – Shirt clip – Carry pouch 2-12 months producer’s assure
